Three Seattle restaurants mobilize to support protesters — here’s a look at how

Steps from the epicenter of Seattle's George Floyd protests — the East police precinct on Capitol Hill — three restaurants have morphed into aid stations for protesters who might have been tear-gassed this week, or maybe just had low blood sugar.  VIEW Updated 11:45 am
